about_the_game:
Costumes for all characters - including DLC characters. 

Basically, our dev team wanted to do silly drawings for this Halloween season, and..... well, here are your funny lil' furry friends. Decked out in SUPER DISCOUNT outfits.

To play this DLC:

  • Start the game

  • Select 'Sketch Characters' when prompted to choose which style of game you'd want.
detailed_description:
Costumes for all characters - including DLC characters. 

Basically, our dev team wanted to do silly drawings for this Halloween season, and..... well, here are your funny lil' furry friends. Decked out in SUPER DISCOUNT outfits.

To play this DLC:

  • Start the game

  • Select 'Sketch Characters' when prompted to choose which style of game you'd want.
